ein.label: Ein
ein.help_text: The EIN assigned by the IRS

pacer_court_id.label: Pacer court id
pacer_court_id.help_text: The numeric ID for the court in PACER. This can be found by looking at the first three digits of any doc1 URL in PACER.

pacer_has_rss_feed.label: Pacer has rss feed
pacer_has_rss_feed.help_text: Whether the court has a PACER RSS feed. If null, this doesn't apply to the given court.

pacer_rss_entry_types.label: Pacer rss entry types
pacer_rss_entry_types.help_text: The types of entries provided by the court's RSS feed.

date_last_pacer_contact.label: Date last pacer contact
date_last_pacer_contact.help_text: The last time the PACER website for the court was successfully contacted

fjc_court_id.label: Fjc court id
fjc_court_id.help_text: The ID used by FJC in the Integrated Database

date_modified.label: Date modified
date_modified.help_text: The last moment when the item was modified

in_use.label: In use
in_use.help_text: Whether this jurisdiction is in use in CourtListener -- increasingly True

has_opinion_scraper.label: Has opinion scraper
has_opinion_scraper.help_text: Whether the jurisdiction has a scraper that obtains opinions automatically.

has_oral_argument_scraper.label: Has oral argument scraper
has_oral_argument_scraper.help_text: Whether the jurisdiction has a scraper that obtains oral arguments automatically.

position.label: Position
position.help_text: A dewey-decimal-style numeral indicating a hierarchical ordering of jurisdictions

citation_string.label: Citation string
citation_string.help_text: the citation abbreviation for the court as dictated by Blue Book

short_name.label: Short name
short_name.help_text: a short name of the court

full_name.label: Full name
full_name.help_text: the full name of the court

url.label: Url
url.help_text: the homepage for each court or the closest thing thereto

start_date.label: Start date
start_date.help_text: the date the court was established, if known

end_date.label: End date
end_date.help_text: the date the court was abolished, if known

jurisdiction.label: Jurisdiction
jurisdiction.help_text: the jurisdiction of the court, one of: F (Federal Appellate), FD (Federal District), FB (Federal Bankruptcy), FBP (Federal Bankruptcy Panel), FS (Federal Special), S (State Supreme), SA (State Appellate), ST (State Trial), SS (State Special), TRS (Tribal Supreme), TRA (Tribal Appellate), TRT (Tribal Trial), TRX (Tribal Special), TS (Territory Supreme), TA (Territory Appellate), TT (Territory Trial), TSP (Territory Special), SAG (State Attorney General), MA (Military Appellate), MT (Military Trial), C (Committee), I (International), T (Testing)

date_created.label: Date created
date_created.help_text: The moment when the item was created.

date_modified.label: Date modified
date_modified.help_text: The last moment when the item was modified. A value in year 1750 indicates the value is unknown

position_type.label: Position type
position_type.help_text: If this is a judicial position, this indicates the role the person had. This field may be blank if job_title is complete instead.

choices.display_name: Special Superior Court Judge for Complex Business Cases

job_title.label: Job title
job_title.help_text: If title isn't in position_type, a free-text position may be entered here.

sector.label: Sector
sector.help_text: Whether the job was private or public sector.

organization_name.label: Organization name
organization_name.help_text: If the organization where this position was held is not a school or court, this is the place it was held.

location_city.label: Location city
location_city.help_text: If not a court or school, the city where person worked.

location_state.label: Location state
location_state.help_text: If not a court or school, the state where person worked.

date_nominated.label: Date nominated
date_nominated.help_text: The date recorded in the Senate Executive Journal when a federal judge was nominated for their position or the date a state judge nominated by the legislature. When a nomination is by primary election, this is the date of the election. When a nomination is from a merit commission, this is the date the nomination was announced.

date_elected.label: Date elected
date_elected.help_text: Judges are elected in most states. This is the date of theirfirst election. This field will be null if the judge was initially selected by nomination.

date_recess_appointment.label: Date recess appointment
date_recess_appointment.help_text: If a judge was appointed while congress was in recess, this is the date of that appointment.

date_referred_to_judicial_committee.label: Date referred to judicial committee
date_referred_to_judicial_committee.help_text: Federal judges are usually referred to the Judicial Committee before being nominated. This is the date of that referral.

date_judicial_committee_action.label: Date judicial committee action
date_judicial_committee_action.help_text: The date that the Judicial Committee took action on the referral.

judicial_committee_action.label: Judicial committee action
judicial_committee_action.help_text: The action that the judicial committee took in response to a nomination

date_hearing.label: Date hearing
date_hearing.help_text: After being nominated, a judge is usually subject to a hearing. This is the date of that hearing.

date_confirmation.label: Date confirmation
date_confirmation.help_text: After the hearing the senate will vote on judges. This is the date of that vote.

date_start.label: Date start
date_start.help_text: The date the position starts active duty.

date_termination.label: Date termination
date_termination.help_text: The last date of their employment. The compliment to date_start

date_retirement.label: Date retirement
date_retirement.help_text: The date when they become a senior judge by going into active retirement

nomination_process.label: Nomination process
nomination_process.help_text: The process by which a person was nominated into this position.

vote_type.label: Vote type
vote_type.help_text: The type of vote that resulted in this position.

voice_vote.label: Voice vote
voice_vote.help_text: Whether the Senate voted by voice vote for this position.

votes_yes.label: Votes yes
votes_yes.help_text: If votes are an integer, this is the number of votes in favor of a position.

votes_no.label: Votes no
votes_no.help_text: If votes are an integer, this is the number of votes opposed to a position.

votes_yes_percent.label: Votes yes percent
votes_yes_percent.help_text: If votes are a percentage, this is the percentage of votes in favor of a position.

votes_no_percent.label: Votes no percent
votes_no_percent.help_text: If votes are a percentage, this is the percentage of votes opposed to a position.

how_selected.label: How selected
how_selected.help_text: The method that was used for selecting this judge for this position (generally an election or appointment).

has_inferred_values.label: Has inferred values
has_inferred_values.help_text: Some or all of the values for this position were inferred from a data source instead of manually added. See sources field for more details.

choices.display_name: [('jud', 'Judge'), ('jus', 'Justice'), ('ad-law-jud', 'Administrative Law Judge'), ('act-jud', 'Acting Judge'), ('act-jus', 'Acting Justice'), ('act-pres-jud', 'Acting Presiding Judge'), ('act-c-admin-jus', 'Acting Chief Administrative Justice'), ('ass-jud', 'Associate Judge'), ('ass-jus', 'Associate Justice'), ('ass-c-jud', 'Associate Chief Judge'), ('ass-pres-jud', 'Associate Presiding Judge'), ('asst-pres-jud', 'Assistant Presiding Judge'), ('c-jud', 'Chief Judge'), ('c-jus', 'Chief Justice'), ('c-spec-m', 'Chief Special Master'), ('c-admin-jus', 'Chief Administrative Justice'), ('pres-jud', 'Presiding Judge'), ('pres-jus', 'Presiding Justice'), ('sup-jud', 'Supervising Judge'), ('ad-pres-jus', 'Administrative Presiding Justice'), ('com', 'Commissioner'), ('com-dep', 'Deputy Commissioner'), ('jud-pt', 'Judge Pro Tem'), ('jus-pt', 'Justice Pro Tem'), ('ref-jud-tr', 'Judge Trial Referee'), ('ref-off', 'Official Referee'), ('ref-state-trial', 'State Trial Referee'), ('ret-act-jus', 'Active Retired Justice'), ('ret-ass-jud', 'Retired Associate Judge'), ('ret-c-jud', 'Retired Chief Judge'), ('ret-jus', 'Retired Justice'), ('ret-senior-jud', 'Senior Judge'), ('mag', 'Magistrate'), ('c-mag', 'Chief Magistrate'), ('pres-mag', 'Presiding Magistrate'), ('mag-pt', 'Magistrate Pro Tem'), ('mag-rc', 'Magistrate (Recalled)'), ('mag-part-time', 'Magistrate (Part-Time)'), ('spec-chair', 'Special Chairman'), ('spec-jud', 'Special Judge'), ('spec-m', 'Special Master'), ('spec-scjcbc', 'Special Superior Court Judge for Complex Business Cases'), ('chair', 'Chairman'), ('chan', 'Chancellor'), ('presi-jud', 'President'), ('res-jud', 'Reserve Judge'), ('trial-jud', 'Trial Judge'), ('vice-chan', 'Vice Chancellor'), ('vice-cj', 'Vice Chief Judge')]

[('att-gen', 'Attorney General'), ('att-gen-ass', 'Assistant Attorney General'), ('att-gen-ass-spec', 'Special Assistant Attorney General'), ('sen-counsel', 'Senior Counsel'), ('dep-sol-gen', 'Deputy Solicitor General')]
